hero_subtitle: From creative ideas to digital reality!
about_text: Creative, curious and passionate, I took my first steps in graphic design as a self-taught artist. Thanks to accessible resources like YouTube, I nurtured my visual sensibility and acquired a solid foundation in design. My desire to learn naturally led me to platforms such as OpenClassrooms, where I strengthened my web design skills (HTML & CSS). Driven by the desire to deepen my knowledge, I followed the UI/UX Design specialization from CalArts on Coursera, a comprehensive training that introduced me to user-centered design methodologies, web and mobile mockup creation, wireframes, and the strategic thinking behind a good user experience. In parallel, I completed a 300-hour certification in Responsive Web Design on freeCodeCamp, which allowed me to master responsive integration and modern front-end development best practices. Always on the lookout for innovations, I also integrate artificial intelligence into my creation processes. I use tools like Cursor AI to optimize code writing, automate certain tasks and test my ideas more quickly, making my projects more fluid and efficient.
design_graphic_desc: Logos, social media and print materials
challenge_text: Ready to take on new creative challenges?
logo_design_desc: Creation of unique and professional logos tailored to the needs of businesses and brands. Each design is conceived to reflect the client's identity and values.
social_design_desc: Design of impactful visuals for social networks (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn...). The goal is to capture attention and optimize engagement through attractive and modern designs.
print_design_desc: Creation of printed materials such as business cards, flyers, posters and brochures. Each design is optimized for professional rendering and high-quality printing, while respecting the client's visual identity.
web_app_design_desc: Design of modern and responsive websites and applications, adapted to the needs of businesses and individuals. From UX/UI design to integration applying the following technologies (html, css and javascript), each project is optimized to offer a smooth user experience and attractive design.
